description: This stunning 450SL with low miles hails from the great dry state of California,the car reflects the mild climate from which it came. Review the pictures posted on the slideshow presentation,note the near new soft top,the crack free dash,the nice hard top,the Euro style headlamps,beautiful chrome wheels,the nice condition of the interior seats.The car reflects the low mileage.The body panels are straight with nice factory straight panel gaps.
The car has a nice run and drive with tight tie rod ends,a transmission that shifts at the correct power points,nice tires and suspension as well a solid smoke free 4.5 V8 engine.
Upon reviewing the pictures if the car holds interest,you may reach me at 615-971-4409.
The car is located at our indoor facility 25 miles east of downtown Nashville Tennessee,independent inspections are welcomed and encouraged.
There will be an additional $299 dealer doc fee assessed to the final transaction amount.
This and other European Collector cars may be reviewed at JPFRAZIER.com

1975 Mercedes 450SL This Triple Black 450 SL is truly an exceptional find. With only 55,000 miles, it has all of the indicators of a low mileage, well cared for Mercedes. If you are looking for a Mercedes SL, you probably already understand the value of finding a high quality, well maintained original . Our eighty-year-old seller has been a passionate owner of two collectible Mercedes models, this and a rare 1977 450SLC four-seat coupe. Please note the seats have been covered by very high-quality Sheep Skin covers during his stewardship and have protected the original leather covers and the integrity of the factory padding and structure. The original books are still with the car. I checked in with the Mercedes mechanic that provided care for his cars who shared that this gentleman had been a loyal customer for over 35 years. We welcome a full inspection by a qualified mechanic of your choice. Call us for more details or come see it at our Detroit location! ClassicAuto Showplace, LTD. 2135 Stephenson Hwy. Troy, MI, 48083. We are just south of I-75 at the Rochester Rd Exit. Phone: (248) 589-2700. Email:

The silver paint on this 1980 Mercedes-Benz 450SL is in pristine condition. There is only 105741 original miles showing on the odometer of this all original classic german roadster. Meaning there is plenty of live left in the fuel injected all aluminum 4.5 Litre V8. Paired with a 3-speed automatic transmission that shifts just a smooth as the day it was new helps make this german car a great choice to cruise down any road. Independent front and rear suspension with double wishbones keeps with the sporty feel of this car but also allows anyone along for the ride to be comfortable. With the choice of both a hard and a soft tops you will have the option to be comfortable no matter the weather. Factory wheels and radial tires round out the package. This 38-year old classic is in showroom condition but is also ready to hit the road. You can view this 1980 Mercedes-Benz in greater detail including HD pictures and an HD video of it running and driving at Gatewayclassiccars.com. If you are interested in purchasing this vehicle or have more questions regarding it please call us at (303) 872-4722 or email us at
[Email Dealer]

Motorcar Studio is pleased to offer this 1975 Mercedes-Benz 450SL.  Finished in Ikon Gold Metallic over Tobacco leather interior, it's an attractive color combination not often seen. Shows to a nice driver standard inside and out - brown canvas soft top is nearly new and the original hard top is in good condition. This 107 was sold new by Atlanta Classic Cars back when they were located on Church Street in Decatur; it's been in the Atlanta area ever since. The current owner, a retired university professor,  bought it in 1995 with right at 45k miles (records support the current mileage of just over 101k). It's been garaged and very well maintained since, with stacks of service receipts totaling tens of thousands of dollars.

Recent service within the last 10,000 miles includes timing chains, tensioners and guides, valve adjustment, valve cover gaskets, full tune-up, motor mounts, transmission reseal, new flex disks, alternator, starter, brake pads and rotors, plus a new A/C compressor and receiver drier. The front end was rebuilt (along with a new subframe) around 30k miles ago.

The car starts, runs and drives well and the A/C is blowing cold. All factory manuals, stamped service book, two keys, both convertible top handles with pouch, factory jack and tools, plus 23 years' worth of service records are included with the sale. For more information about this 1975 Mercedes-Benz 450SL for sale at Motorcar Studio in Atlanta, please call 404-692-5250.

Selling our 1979 Mercedes Benz 450 SL. It has seen little/rare usage over the last 10 years. Recently took it into CS Cantlin who replaced both front tie rods and center link (September 2017). In addition, they replaced fluids, wiper blades, etc. - and certified it w a fresh state inspection.Title is clean and in hand.68k miles. No rust (confirmed during last inspection). The odometer has been erratic and there is a slow drain of the battery somewhere-- we keep it on a trickle charger. There are some odds and ends that can use more love than money. Original paint, newer soft top, all original interior-- no cracking on the dashboard. Hardtop included but not pictured (its on MB hanging rack in garage). As expected there are some dings, knicks, signs of age. The most notable is that the paint on the right side of the car has a faded clear-coat. There is a small tear in driver's side seat (pictured). The pictures are from last fall after a detailing. It has been covered in my garage since-- fewer than 10 miles driven.
1976 Mercedes 450SEL 1 owner, 81k miles. Outstanding condition. Dark Blue with Tan interior. Highly optioned, everything working as the day it left the factory. Service records.

1973 MERCEDES 450SL     This 450SL is an amazing barn find     Been in dry storage in Southern California for 30 years.   This low mileage car is in very good mechanical and driving condition.   We have put it through our workshops, been through all the hydraulics, fluids, steering brakes etc. Strong engine, good oil pressure and perfect running temperature.   This 450 SL was originally the very desirable Pine Green. However the paint on the car is in very good condition with plenty of shine.   The interior has a little discoloring around the heater control panel but the rest of it including seats and door panels is very clean and striking.   Good soft top and hard top.   Clean California title.   Please call us at Sportscar LA, should you have any questions.  Thank you.   We ship Worldwide !

Very good soft top. Interior is exceptional along with original dash board and excellent wood.   This is one of the nicer examples we have had.   Comes on clean California Title. 1977 Mercedes-Benz 450 SL 2-pass. R-107 convertible

with both convertible soft top and removable hard top. The car is finished in beautiful Light Blue with a Dark Blue interior and trunk, accented with alloy wheels. It is equipped with Becker AM/FM radio, power antenna and factory air conditioning. The engine is the Mercedes-Benz 275.3 ci./4520 cc./180 h.p. OHC V8 with Bosch Jetronic fuel injection, coupled to a 3-speed automatic transmission, with power steering, power brakes, power antenna and Becker AM/FM radio. This car just came out of storage from a private collection and is a great looking and driving car.  This one is one of the best ones out there, don't miss it, come by our store and see it.  There are many SL's on the market, but this is one of the best and still at a sain price.

For sale in our Dallas showroom is a unique 1978 Mercedes Benz 450SL. This 1978 Mercedes underwent a massive restoration including an all new red upholstery and the exterior paint was completely stripped and repainted the beautiful bright red. The red on red color combination looks amazing on this 450SL. This 78 450SL can produce 3 very different looks; hard top featuring same color paint black soft top and of course the classic topless roadster look. The red vinyl interior is in great condition you can be proud to show if off with the top down. Powering this beautiful roadster is a 4.5L V8 engine that produces 180 horsepower. Recent engine work includes a new timing chain gears and guides as well as new fuel injectors. The 3-speed automatic transmission provides excellent shift points and a smooth ride on the freeway or downtown. The Mercedes Benz 450SL was produced between 1972 and 1980 and was a perfect fit for the personal luxury car market. The 450SL featured 4-wheel disc brakes standard. The front suspension setup includes double wishbone coil springs additional rubber springs and a stabilizer bar. The rear suspension is based on a diagonal swing axle with coil springs and a stabilizer bar. The odometer reads 118409 which represents the actual mileage to the car. Options for this 1978 Mercedes Benz 450SL include: Air Conditioning AM/FM Radio with Cassette Manual Convertible Top (Hard and Soft Top) Power Brakes Power Steering Power Windows Seat Belts Vinyl Interior Radial Tires and Aluminum/Alloy Wheels. This is a great example of a rarely seen 450SL with the red on red color combination. It has been restored and shines with pride ready for the new owner to enjoy it. To view this 1978 Mercedes Benz 450SL in greater detail including HD pictures and an HD video visit www.GatewayClassicCars.com or our Dallas showroom. This is a 1978 Mercedes-Benz 450 SL. The car drives, brakes and shifts gear. The 450 SL has the 4520 CC, 8 cyl, 245 HP engine and the very popular automatic transmission. The car has a very posh colour combination. This Mercedes-Benz has American title. Import duties are paid for.

Mercedes-Benz 450SL 1974, Dark Blue.

This Mercedes-Benz 450SL is from 1974. The Mercedes-Benz 450sl looks great, in dark blue with a beige interior. The powerful V8 engine is coupled to the popular automatic gearbox. This Mercedes-Benz is equipped with the nice and narrow European bumpers and headlights. The mohair soft-top looks nice and well maintained. The 450Sl comes with a Dutch license and a valid Dutch periodic vehicle inspection.
